summary: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
cast: Sumi Shimamoto|Mahito Tsujimura|Hisako Kyôda|Gorô Naya|Ichirô Nagai|Kôhei Miyauchi|Jôji Yanami|Minoru Yada|Rihoko Yoshida|Masako Sugaya|Takako Sasuga|Chika Sakamoto|Tarako|Yôji Matsuda|Mîna Tominaga|Mugihito|Akiko Tsuboi|Yoshiko Sakakibara|Iemasa Kayumi|Tetsuo Mizutori|Takeki Nakamura|Takako Ôta|Bin Shimada|Shinji Nomura|Hisako Ayuhara|Hôchû Ôtsuka|Alison Lohman|Patrick Stewart|Uma Thurman|Chris Sarandon|Shia LaBeouf|Edward James Olmos|Mark Hamill|Jeff Bennett|Tress MacNeille|Tony Jay|Jodi Benson|Mark Silverman|James Arnold Taylor|Frank Welker|Newell Alexander|Rosemary Alexander|Tom Amundsen|Stephen Apostolina|Mitch Carter|Robert Clotworthy|David Cowgill|Wendy Cutler|Ike Eisenmann|Jean Gilpin|Nicholas Guest|Bridget Hoffman|Sherry Hursey|Rif Hutton|Edie Mirman|Richard Miro|Peter Renaday|Lynnanne Zager|Emily Bauer|Paul Butcher|Ashley Edner|Molly Marlette|Ashley Rose|Jordan Del Spina|Aimee Roldan|Grace Rolek|Ross Simanteris|Jimmy Keegan|Mona Marshall|Alvy Moore|Patricia Parris|Ken Sansom|John Schwab|Hal Smith|Dee Bradley Baker|Bettina Bush|Cam Clarke|Peter Cullen|Susan Davis|Linda Gary|Doris Hess|Russell Johnson|Daamen J. title: Nausicaä del Valle del Viento
